long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What would do you do if you were bored out of your mind, sitting in your high school math class, with the mandatory scientific calculator they made you buy?
Well if you're anything like me, you'd type 0, then another 0, then another 0, then a 1, then fill out the rest of the line with 0s.
You'd repeat that pattern on the next line except the 1 would appear in the 5th position.
Then in the 6th on the next line, and so on and so forth until you had a line of 1s bouncing diagonally down the screen.
Scrolling through those screens of bouncing lines provided me and my friends with hours of entertainment over the years, and I wanted to relive and share that joy and nostalgia with you.
May it delight you like it did us
